extendedInfo.description: Roofing Calculator version 2.1 - PLEASE UPDATE. More app info on http://www.RoofingCalculator.org/app.phpNOTE: Before you buy this app, watch demo videos on http://www.youtube.com/roofcalculatorThere is no Metric system yet! We will add it soon. V2.1 - Small bug fixes - see "Recent Changes"V2.0 Update:Here are some highlights of new options added:- Multiple Roof Sections â now you are not limited to one roof calculation at a time. You can add up-to 10 roofs or sections per calculation. Our app will intuitively add up all the roof sizes, materials needed for the job, and give you a detailed report, showing totals and breakdowns for each section.- Saving and Exporting of Results â now every time you calculate a roof, a report will be generated, that you can go back to, and either modify it, review or export to yourself of to your client in a professional looking PDF file, with your companyâs letterhead, as an official proposal.- GPS Location â to make your day-to-day roofing work easier, the Roofing Calculator App will intuitively get you location during an estimate, and record the address with fair degree of accuracy and speed. This address will be associated with each saved report. You can always go back and change the address, as well as add customerâs information and your notes about the project.- Improved Roof Calculation Accuracy with addition of Valley, Dormers, Miscellaneous Costs (Permits, Dumpsters, Equipment, etc) and Sales Tax calculation.+++++++Roofing Calculator app is made for roofing contractors and sales people to help you quickly estimate roofing cost, roof size, and roofing materials amount and prices. Roofing calculator is an excellent sales and roof estimating tool for roofing sales professionals. It's great at calculating roofing prices for asphalt shingles roofs and metal roofing prices. Roof Calculator will greatly simplify your roof estimate process. With roofing calculator you can provide a roof quote to your customer on the spot, instead of having to go to the office. Features include:Fully customizable general materials prices and general settings - you can change: - Waste factor for gable and hip roofs.- Cost per square for materials and labor.- Cost for each skylight and chimney flashing.- Roof tear-off cost per layer.- Miscellaneous materials cost.- Many more setting.Roofing Calculator app for Android combines the functionality of our free online roofing calculator, and gives you flexibility to change all prices and settings, as well as add new roofing materials.Roofing Calculators used in making of this app:- Roof Pitch Calculator- Roofing Materials Calculator- Metal Roofing CalculatorFor every roof you can choose roof size (width and length), roof pitch, roof type (gable or hip), roofing material (each material profile can be changed individually), number of stories / floors in the house (you can charge extra for each addition level), roof difficulty, number of skylight and chimney flashings, ridge vent cut-in and installation, roof tear-off and plywood (CDX / OSB) and other roof deck replacement.Roofing Calculator app is also available on iOS devices - iPhone and iPad.Get Roofing Calculator for iPhone from App Store - http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/roofing-calculator-pro/id441856599?mt=8&ls=1Tags: Roofing, Roof, Roofing Calculator, Roof Calc, Roofing Materials, Asphalt Shingles, Roofing Estimate, Roof Estimator, Estimate Roofing Cost, Roofing Prices, Metal Roofing, metal roof, roofing cost, construction, remodeling, home improvement, roof repair, construction calculator, roofing estimator, roof pitch, metal roofing prices, cost of metal roofing, roof estimating software.Follow Roofing Calculator on Google+ https://plus.google.com/107687954069782939380?rel=author

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: Takes a few minutes to preset common roof type profiles, along with prices. Once on the job the app is quite helpful and eady to use for quick estimates. Prints out a detailed roof report, which helps close the sale
reviews.author: Anna Slyuz

reviews.title: Great roofer app
reviews.comment: I use this to calculate Tamko metal roofing shingles jobs. Very fast and accurate!
reviews.author: Alejandro Bitz

reviews.title: Good program for roofer
reviews.comment: Easy to use after u enter all labor costs and material prices. Save time when do roof estimate, and send proposal to customer
reviews.author: Andriy Baran

reviews.title: New Version is great
reviews.comment: Finally i can estimate multiple roofs at once and add valleys  and dormers. Also love the export to email. So much better than old version - nice!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Square roof calculator...call it what it is.
reviews.comment: Simple roofs it can do...not anything complicated. Wasted money...
reviews.author: Tom Powell

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I like so far but marry take a little time to get used to.
reviews.author: isaac wilkins

reviews.title: Good investment!!!
reviews.comment: Easy to use. Thanks :-)

reviews.title: Killer app saves time &time is money
reviews.comment: Easy and professional...Quick

reviews.title: Over all pretty good!
reviews.comment: Would be great to add a photo or two and a company logo.
reviews.author: Beau Stowe

reviews.title: Roof
reviews.comment: Its not a great biding program. Not easy to use on hard roofs
reviews.author: james clements

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: Really needs to be able to work out in m2 not just f2. Who the help works in imperial anymore. At least have the option to change it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very convenient
reviews.comment: I am a real estate agent and my clients often ask me how much a new roof would cost. With this roof calculator I can easily and accurately estimate prices and i don\'t need to rely on roofers for a quote anymore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Help me alot to price roof and save me time to estimate project and materials.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more options
reviews.comment: Cannot do dormers, roll roofing ,Ice barrier or metal good app just needs more for contractors
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like the app but it should do multiple roof measurements and more profiles for the cost of it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: APP
reviews.comment: GREAT

reviews.comment: Not wat I was expecting at all
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: there is no way to calculate roofs with more than 1 sections! not a bad app if it cost 2 dollars instead of 20
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like I but u need to add ability to calculate multiple roofs and email results
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Helps me sell roofs
reviews.comment: When customers call, you put them on loud speaker, open roof calculator, plug in the numbers, and have a quick quote for them. Took some time to setup all materials and labor, but once done, estimating is super fast. You can just walk around house with tape measure, and plug in the numbers. Also nice than I can estimate house and garage roof at once, and email estimate to customers. Great app
reviews.author: Lenny Roofer
